author: Vincent Wood, Zoe Tidman, Kate Devlin, Vincent Wood, Zoe Tidman, Kate Devlin
title: Coronavirus: Many parts of UK 'just past the peak' of outbreak, says leading expert
description: 'I think the number of new infections stabilised maybe a week or two ago,' Sir Jeremy Farrar says
content:
Britains deputy chief medical officer has said the coronavirus outbreak is starting to plateau, after a government adviser claimed the country may have passed the peak of the disease.
Jenny Harries said the latest figures showed the spread of the virus was h… [+6570 chars]
